scripts.all: npm run clean:files && npm run lint:headers && npm run lint:whitespace
scripts.build:prod: npm run lint:crlf && npm run build:sass && npm run build:icons && npm run build:psa && npm run build:bundle-prod
scripts.clean:files: rimraf .pulp-cache output tmp public/js/file.js public/js/filesystem.js public/js/workspace.js public/js/auth_redirect.js public/css/main.css
scripts.clean:npm: rimraf output node_components && npm cache clean && npm install
scripts.docker:stop:remove: npm run docker:stop && npm run docker:remove:containers
scripts.docker:stop:remove:all: npm run docker:stop:all && npm run docker:remove:all:containers
scripts.test:docker:isrunning: if docker inspect -f {{.State.Running}} $CONNECTOR_HOST; then npm run docker:stop:remove && npm run test:setup ; else npm run test:setup ; fi
scripts.test:setup: npm run build:icons && npm run docker:$CONNECTOR_HOST && npm run build:psa && webpack --progress --config webpack.config.dev.js && npm test
scripts.test:couchbase: ABV=cb CONNECTOR_HOST=couchbase CONNECTOR_TYPE=Couchbase CONNECTOR_PORT=11210 QUASAR_PORT=63175 npm run test:docker:isrunning
scripts.test:couchbase:fast: ABV=cb CONNECTOR_HOST=couchbase CONNECTOR_TYPE=Couchbase CONNECTOR_PORT=11210 QUASAR_PORT=63175 npm run test
scripts.test:mongo: ABV=md CONNECTOR_HOST=mongo CONNECTOR_TYPE=MongoDB CONNECTOR_PORT=27017 QUASAR_PORT=63176 npm run test:docker:isrunning
scripts.test:mongo:fast: ABV=md CONNECTOR_HOST=mongo CONNECTOR_TYPE=MongoDB CONNECTOR_PORT=27017 QUASAR_PORT=63176 npm run test
scripts.test:marklogic: ABV=ml CONNECTOR_HOST=marklogic CONNECTOR_TYPE=Marklogic CONNECTOR_PORT=8000 QUASAR_PORT=63177 npm run test:docker:isrunning
scripts.test:marklogic:fast: ABV=ml CONNECTOR_HOST=marklogic CONNECTOR_TYPE=Marklogic CONNECTOR_PORT=8000 QUASAR_PORT=63177 npm run test
